title: Mafia hit man who killed famous prosecutor and dissolved boy's body in acid apologizes for role in "factory of death"
content:
1. Mafia hit man who killed famous prosecutor and dissolved boy's body in acid apologizes for role in "factory of death"  CBS News
  2. Mafia hit man apologizes; Italians indignant at his release  Fox News
  3. Mafia hitman Giovanni Brusca released from prison, apologizes for role in ‘factory of death’  AL.com
  4. Mafia hit man’s release from prison, apology for role in ‘factory of death’ draw indignation in Italy  Sun Sentinel
  5. A law to break the Mafia's code of silence lets a killer go free  The Economist
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Mafia hit man who killed famous prosecutor and dissolved boy's body in acid apologizes for role in "factory of death"  CBS News

localize.title: 有名検事を殺害し、少年の遺体を酸で溶かしたマフィアの殺し屋が「死の工場」での役割を謝罪
黑手党杀手杀害著名检察官并将男孩的尸体溶于酸液中，为在 "死亡工厂 "中的角色道歉
黑手黨殺手殺害著名檢察官並將男孩的屍體溶於酸液中，爲在 "死亡工廠 "中的角色道歉
